thanks:
It is a pleasure to offer you my services.

The robot now uses [slash commands](https://discord.com/developers/docs/interactions/slash-commands).
If you don't have access to bot commands, please update permissions with [this link](<link>).

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to join the [support server](<server>).
bot_add: `<user>` can now register a maximum of `<count>` robots.
bot_addtoken: `<tag>` has been added to your account and is now online.
bot_list_empty: You don't have a registered bot.
bot_setpresence: The Discord Presence has been changed.
bot_setcolor: The Discord Embed color has been changed.
radio_success: `<radio>` radio was broadcast on the channel <channel>.
reaction_await_reaction: React to this message with an emoji corresponding to the role <role>.
reaction_add: React to any of these reactions to get the role:
emoji_await_reaction: React to this message to add new emojis.
autorole_add: The role <role> will be given when someone joins.
autorole_remove: The role <role> will no longer be assigned when someone joins.
autorole_list: The roles that will be assigned to newcomers are: <list>
autorole_restore: Restore roles has been set to `<option>`.
music_success: The music channel has been created.
music_watting:
Waiting for music ...
To add music, you need to put something to search or youtube, soundcloud, spotify link.
music_playlist: To put this playlist back in the queue, copy this:
music_add: Current song added to your playlist.
music_remove: Current song deleted from your playlist.
music_reaction_previous: Replay the current music or go back to the previous music.
music_reaction_next: Go to the next music or disconnect the bot.
music_reaction_own: Put your own playlist (if nothing is played).
music_reaction_savefree: Save the current music to its own playlist.
music_reaction_bassboost: Boost the bass on the following musics.
music_reaction_autoplay: Automatically add music to the playlist (If the current song allows it).
music_reaction_lyrics: Display the lyrics of the current song.
message_help: Send an embed with the bot.
message_title: Send the title or click on the reaction to not put a title.
message_image: Send the url of the image or click on the reaction to not put an image.
message_footer: Send the footer or click on the reaction to not put a footer.
event_image_toggle_true: Imaging is on and is in the channel <channel>.
event_toggle_true: Category `<category>` has been activated in channel <channel>.
event_toggle_false: Category `<category>` has been disabled in channel <channel>.
event_message_update: A message from `<user>` has been updated.
nomicro_true: Automatic channel creation for those without a microphone is enabled.
nomicro_false: Automatic channel creation for those without a microphone is disabled.
